attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children are being taken from innocent families, based on probabilities, NOT actual proof! This MUST be stopped. Family courts should be open and based on proof, before taking a child from  loving families NOW! Please support my petition!

rejection.details:
I'm sorry, but we still can't accept this. 

The title of your petition needs to be a call to action, not your name or the name of your organisation.  It should say something like, to use three recent examples, "Reduce the damage being done to the nation in the name of political correctness" or "Award silver jubilee medal to all service personal serving in 1977" or "Reduce the fees for late payment of council tax".  

Please also remove all the CAPITALS as they make it hard for people to read.

If you'd like to create a new petition based on these criteria we will re-consider it.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
